overview: Thriller - A narcoleptic, Sonny (Barnaby Hitzig), unwittingly falls prey to his dark side during a camping trip with his betrothed, Addie (Beth Anne Garrison). When he starts to tell her a story about a ghost, he slips into his murderous alter ego, who "kidnaps" them both and takes them on a dangerous journey peopled with shady characters. Can Addie snap Sonny out of his fugue state before he ends up killing them both? The clock is ticking. -  Hunter Mackenzie Austin, Jana Camp, Elizabeth Gudenrath
title: Remmer
